SS-037 - If PV1-36 (Discharge Disposition) is valued with any of the following: '20', '40', '41', '42' then PID-30 (Patient Death Indicator) SHALL be valued to the Literal Value 'Y'.
SS-017-ack - An instance of MSH.21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL contain the constant value: PH_SS-Ack^SS Sender^2.16.840.1.114222.4.10.3^ISO
SS-043 - MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL be literal '|' (ASCII 124).
SS-044 - MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL be literal value '^~\&' (ASCII 94, 126, 92, and 38 respectively).
SS-013 - MSH-7.1 (Date/Time of Message.Time) SHALL be expressed with a minimum precision of the nearest minute and be represented in the following format: 'YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]] [+/-ZZZZ]'
SS-015 - MSH-11.1 (Processing ID.Processing ID) SHALL have a value in the set of literal values: "P" for Production, "D" for Debug or "T" for Training.
SS-016 - MSH-12.1 (Version ID.Version ID) SHALL have a value '2.5.1'
SS-014 - MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL be the literal value: 'ADT^A01^ADT_A01' for Admission Messages
NIST-SS-002 - MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be the literal value: 'NE'.

SS-018 - EVN-2.1 (Recorded Date/Time of Message.Time) SHALL be expressed with a minimum precision of the nearest minute, and be represented in the following format: 'YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]] [+/- ZZZZ]'
SS-019 - PID-1 (Set ID - PID) SHALL be valued with the constant value '1'.
SS-023 - PID-5 (Patient Name) SHALL be valued as |~^^^^^^S| or |~^^^^^^U|).

SS-036 - If valued, PID-29 (Patient Death and Time), SHALL be expressed with a minimum precision of the nearest minute and be represented in the following format:'YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]][+/- ZZZZ]'
SS-024 - PV1-1 (Set ID) SHALL be valued with the constant value '1'.
SS-010 - PV1-44.1 (Admit Date/Time.Time) SHALL be expressed with a minimum precision of the nearest minute and be represented in the following format: 'YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]] [+/-ZZZZ]'
SS-045 - PV1-45.1 (Discharge Date/Time.Time) SHALL be expressed with a minimum precision of the nearest minute and be represented in the following format: 'YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]] [+/-ZZZZ]'
NIST-SS-009 - PV2-3.3 SHALL be valued "I9CDX" or "I10C" or "SCT".
SS-027 - OBX-1(SetID) for the first instance of an OBX Segment SHALL have the Literal Value of '1'. Each following occurrence SHALL be numbered consecutively.
NIST-SS-012 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with SS002 TREATING FACILITY LOCATION (PHINQUESTION), then OBX-2 (Value Type) SHALL be valued 'XAD'.
NIST-SS-014 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with SS003 FACILITY/VISIT TYPE (PHINQUESTION), then OBX-2 (Value Type) SHALL be valued 'CWE'

NIST-SS-015 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with SS003 FACILITY/VISIT TYPE (PHINQUESTION), then OBX-5 (Observation Value) SHALL be valued to a member of the set: PHVS_FacilityVisitType_SyndromicSurveillance
NIST-SS-016 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 21612-7 AGE – REPORTED (LOINC), then OBX-2 (Value Type) SHALL be valued 'NM'.
SS-029 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 21612-7 AGE-REPORTED (LOINC), then OBX-6.1 (Unit Identifier) SHALL be valued to a member of the set: PHVS_AgeUnit_SyndromicSurveillance
NIST-SS-011 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 8661-1 CHIEF COMPLAINT-REPORTED (LOINC), then OBX-2 (Value Type) SHALL be valued 'TX'.
NIST-SS-017 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 56816-2 PATIENT LOCATION (LOINC), then OBX-2 (Value Type) SHALL be valued 'CWE'.

NIST-SS-018 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 56816-2 PATIENT LOCATION (LOINC), then OBX-5 (Observation Value) SHALL be valued to a member of the set: NHSNHealthcareServiceLocationCode

NIST-SS-020 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 8302-2 BODY HEIGHT (LOINC), then OBX-6.1 (Unit Identifier) SHALL be valued to a member of the set: PHVS_HeightUnit_UCUM

NIST-SS-017 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 56816-2 PATIENT LOCATION (LOINC), then OBX-2 (Value Type) SHALL be valued 'CWE'.

NIST-SS-018 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 56816-2 PATIENT LOCATION (LOINC), then OBX-5 (Observation Value) SHALL be valued to a member of the set: NHSNHealthcareServiceLocationCode
NIST-SS-019 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 8302-2 BODY HEIGHT (LOINC), then OBX-2 (Value Type) SHALL be valued 'NM'.
NIST-SS-020 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 8302-2 BODY HEIGHT (LOINC), then OBX-6.1 (Unit Identifier) SHALL be valued to a member of the set: PHVS_HeightUnit_UCUM
NIST-SS-021 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 3141-9 BODY WEIGHT MEASURED (LOINC), then OBX-2 (Value Type) SHALL be valued 'NM'.
NIST-SS-022 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 3141-9 BODY WEIGHT MEASURED (LOINC), then OBX-6.1 (Unit Identifier) SHALL be valued to a member of the set: PHVS_WeightUnit_UCUM
NIST-SS-023 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 72166-2 TOBACCO SMOKING STATUS (LOINC), then OBX-2 (Value Type) SHALL be valued 'CWE'.
NIST-SS-024 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 72166-2 TOBACCO SMOKING STATUS (LOINC), then OBX-5 (Observation Value) SHALL be valued to a member of the set: PHVS_SmokingStatus_MU
SS-030 - If OBX 3.1 (Observation Identifier) is valued with 11289-6 BODY TEMPERATURE, INITIAL (LOINC), then OBX-6.1 (Unit Identifier) SHALL be valued to a member of the set: PHVS_TemperatureUnit_UCUM

SS-032 - DG1-1 (Set ID) for the first occurrence of a DG1 Segment SHALL have the Literal Value of '1'. Each following occurrence SHALL be numbered consecutively
NIST-SS-010 - DG1-3.3 SHALL be valued "I9CDX" or "I10C" or "SCT".
SS-040 - DG1-6 Diagnosis Type SHALL be either A (Admitting), F (Final) or W (Working).
